title: ［真心求問 ］Ielts 寫作想拎7點做好

replies.msg:
因為想考專業，但要pass ielts拎language proficiency proof

考左2次，第一次操左d pp reading 同listening,另外果2科無咩點操，結果
Listening 7.5
Reading 8.5
Speaking 6.5 (香港人考）
Writing 5.5

收左皮之後開始上YouTube 睇下攻略同教學
第2次考speaking有7，writing 得6

但basic requirement要writing 有7，其他細分已經夠做

真心求問writing 點操好，自問都唔係勤力背生字，同埋睇人話寫得太似範文衰硬，睇d ielts course唔知信唔信得過，又好貴，想10月前考多次唔知會唔會太chur，求各位賜教
借位sor
閱讀多些英文的作品，例如Charles Spurgeon 、Dickens的都有助改善寫作。

操多幾份PP
上YOUTUBE睇啲人講點寫
買ielts書睇
我同你一樣 speaking都係香港人考writing 5.5 ，私補有無用

quote.msg: 閱讀多些英文的作品，例如Charles Spurgeon 、Dickens的都有助改善寫作。

replies.msg: 睇左明左但唔等於寫到

上YOUTUBE睇啲人講點寫
買ielts書睇

replies.msg: 有無邊本書推薦

quote.msg: 我同你一樣 speaking都係香港人考writing 5.5 ，私補有無用

replies.msg: 如果有用求介紹

想知reading listening可以點操
reading嗰成績太廢
Lm學野
留名

quote.msg: 閱讀多些英文的作品，例如Charles Spurgeon 、Dickens的都有助改善寫作。

replies.msg:
睇咁久遠嘅作品冇咩用，好多字詞用法太古老，例如而家好少人用"for" 解做 "because"，但果個年代好常用。

睇太文學嘅作品對考lelts 幫助都唔大，因為ielts 唔會咁寫。我唔係話冇幫助，相反，文學作品幫助極大，但個效果冇可能短期內translate 去寫用文寫作能力上。

下面係Charles Dickens 雙城記第一段，基本上冇native級嘅功底，夾硬學佢個style, 淨係會學到錯漏百出，5.5都不如

It was the year of Our Lord one thousand seven hundred and seventy-five. Spiritual revelations were conceded to England at that favoured period, as at this. Mrs. Southcott had recently attained her five-and-twentieth blessed birthday, of whom a prophetic private in the Life Guards had heralded the sublime appearance by announcing that arrangements were made for the swallowing up of London and Westminster. Even the Cock-lane ghost had been laid only a round dozen of years, after rapping out its messages, as the spirits of this very year last past (supernaturally deficient in originality) rapped out theirs. Mere messages in the earthly order of events had lately come to the English Crown and People, from a congress of British subjects in America: which, strange to relate, have proved more important to the human race than any communications yet received through any of the chickens of the Cock-lane brood.

quote.msg:
想知reading listening可以點操
reading嗰成績太廢

replies.msg:
利申8.5
以前有幫人補過ielts 好難一時之間好

listening同reading 都係要長時間浸無得話 I can score a stellar 9 on a whim. 睇 the economist, netflix 唔用字幕,
不停聽英文radio youtube etc. Reading 如果真係無時間就搵keywords 真係好易拎7/8 我表弟英文dse 4我都操到佢7

quote.msg: 閱讀多些英文的作品，例如Charles Spurgeon 、Dickens的都有助改善寫作。

睇咁久遠嘅作品冇咩用，好多字詞用法太古老，例如而家好少人用"for" 解做 "because"，但果個年代好常用。

睇太文學嘅作品對考lelts 幫助都唔大，因為ielts 唔會咁寫。我唔係話冇幫助，相反，文學作品幫助極大，但個效果冇可能短期內translate 去寫用文寫作能力上。

下面係Charles Dickens 雙城記第一段，基本上冇native級嘅功底，夾硬學佢個style, 淨係會學到錯漏百出，5.5都不如

It was the year of Our Lord one thousand seven hundred and seventy-five. Spiritual revelations were conceded to England at that favoured period, as at this. Mrs. Southcott had recently attained her five-and-twentieth blessed birthday, of whom a prophetic private in the Life Guards had heralded the sublime appearance by announcing that arrangements were made for the swallowing up of London and Westminster. Even the Cock-lane ghost had been laid only a round dozen of years, after rapping out its messages, as the spirits of this very year last past (supernaturally deficient in originality) rapped out theirs. Mere messages in the earthly order of events had lately come to the English Crown and People, from a congress of British subjects in America: which, strange to relate, have proved more important to the human race than any communications yet received through any of the chickens of the Cock-lane brood.

replies.msg: There are an influx of archaic phrases in Dickens's writing which native speakers will never ever use them on a daily basis, or perhaps, sparingly on specific occasions. If you were to brush up your english you ought to immerse yourself in an english speaking environment.

reading嗰成績太廢

replies.msg: PP唔洗做太多住，我個人覺得reading唔同dse, d野straight forward好多，基本上係篇文搵得返exact working ,不過一次過考3篇係幾攰姐，我第一次操左Cambridge ielts 8-10,做左份卷練下睇文速度，都估唔到有8.5，本身預7

replies.msg:
試下聽pop music填歌詞，網上好多呢類網，可以跟歌詞推斷得黎又可以考自己串字，可以揀程度做
老老豆豆，聽就真係要聽得多先會好，唔洗要求自己聽得明純英國腔（反而難明d），睇下YouTube 咁
好多時其實你聽得明，不過用心諗下，比如佢講某樣野，唔識就即刻google,快上手好多，學到好多日常你唔留意，其實唔深但好易唔識串既字
